summary: reduce dimensions - lower dimensionality, same resolution.
description: Lower dimensionality, same resolution. Dimensions are specified in the `cube:dimensions` property of the STAC collection, e.g. `temporal` or `x`. Note that spatial dimensions could be x, y or z. Spectral is a separate dimension for MSI. Nominal values are possible and need to be mapped, e.g. band names to wavelengths, date strings to numeric timestamps since 1970 etc.

data.description: An array with elements of any type.
